q1: I wonder why soccer is the most popular sport in the world but not the US
a1: Cause US is not as cultured as Europe.
q2: Is football still played on the beach in Brazil?
a2: Yes, they still have beach soccer.
q3: Have you ever played beach soccer?
q4: I wonder why soccer is the most popular sport in Brazil
a4: It is cultural and historical to the country.
a5: And also less cost for the youth
